mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Betsey Mason to Margaret Sweat, 1872 September 4
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mason, Betsey (Elizabeth Price), 1802-1873
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Betsey Mason, Vice Regent for Virginia, to Margaret Sweat, Vice Regent for Maine, September 4, 1872. Chesnut Hill. Discusses Miss Cunningham and her failing health, and her troubles with Vice Regents. Hollingsworth reports several statements made to him about them by the Regent. She wishes this all to be finished and for Miss Cunningham to finally leave Mount Vernon.
